name: Mario Mushano no Chou Shougi Juku
overview: Mario Mushano's Hyper Shogi School (Mario Mushano no Chou Shogi Juku) is a shogi game in which the player will learn how to play watching the different computer movements, watching other matches, trying to play a match, etc. Training with the game the player can answer the different shogi questions and pass the different stages and obtain the certificate.
